skills.name: Shamash Assault
skills.description: [SP: 20][CD: 35s] Smite the enemies in front of the character with the Judgment of Shamash. Enemies take 100% ATK + 1,984x2 Fire DMG, have their Attack and Move Speeds slowed by 30%, suffer 15% more Total DMG Multiplier from hits, receive 936 Fire DMG per second, and have a 10% chance of being stunned for 2.5s. Debuff duration: 15s.While activated, character gains Iron Body and 80% Total DMG Reduction. When the skill is active, character loses 13% Max HP/s for 5s but will not die from this effect. Skill cannot be cast when HP is below 33%.

skills.name: Ember
skills.description: 10% chance of igniting nearby enemies every second, dealing 301 Fire DMG every 0.5s for 3.5s. Attacks against ignited enemies gain 18% Total DMG Multiplier.

skills.name: Key of Destruction
skills.description: In co-op raids, team attacks gain 20.0% Total DMG Multiplier and the team heals for 7.0% HP for 5.1s whenever a character uses a weapon skill.
